TopicTitle: The Mark 4 base presents: All you will ever need pack!

Articles.Content:
So, space is dark. Very dark. Poor little kerbals have nothing to listen to, during those long..long...trips....

BUT BEHOLD!

The MK3 LANDING LEG ANTENNA

This may look like a mini landing leg, but when deployed, it activates a sound wave!

Current music:

CH1: In cor vitrus

CH2: Star trek VOY theme

How it works: Just press g!

How to edit sound: Go to the folder>sound and copy the sound file you want, and rename it:

sound_servomotor.wav

Hope you enjoy!

NEW

The new parts pack by Mark 4 base includes bigger, better parts!

The large SAS module:

(note: the smallness is fixed)

Ever notice that SQUAD has given you a large ASAS module, but not a SAS one? well heres one right for ya!

Large winglet

Now that you have a big sas module, we need some control surfaces too! This is a big winglet, heavier, bigger, and greater power!

(Left= stock Right= Mark 4 version)

Large RCS

Now, for big ships, just like the large winglet, we need more power! This is more powerful, heavier, and better!

Large Swept wing

Now this is quite overkill, but it gives good lift! 4X bigger swept wing!

Large hardpoint

Now, C7 gave us the small hard point, but where is the big one? Right here!

(small vs large in pic)

Large landing leg

Those dang nervas, big engines, and all that, They need legs! powerful legs! Here ya go!

You should theoretically be able to replace the songs with anything you like as long as you rename the file to the correct name, as it appears the part file calls for the particular sound file by name in the config. When deployed, the part will call for the file named "sound_servomotor.wav.mp3". So, as long as you rename it correctly, and put it in the proper place, you SHOULD be able to listen to whatever you want.

Including the Halo Theme.
